headline: Boom in Bespoke ETFs Drives Growth of Niche ‘A-La-Carte’ Options
summary: The number of outstanding contracts has more than tripled since 2022, while the average daily volume has climbed 44% over the past year, according to data from Cboe.  Flex contracts are crucial for building these products, thanks to their ability to let users pick custom strike prices and expiration dates, according to Kaufman, the head of ETFs at $44 billion asset manager Calamos.
